org.itemscript.core.gwt
Class GwtJsonParser

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.gwt.GwtJsonParser

public final class GwtJsonParser
extends java.lang.Object

Parses the string representation of a JSON object into a set of JsonValue-derived objects. Derived from the GWT JSON package's JSONParser, JSONObject, and JSONArray classes.
